Specimen Container(s): Plastic collection tube with funnel lid containing stabilizing liquid
Methodologies: Sample collection and stabilization for molecular genotyping
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Oragene® Dx OGD-500.001, an over-the-counter saliva-based DNA specimen collection device for genetic testing applications
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for non-invasive collection, stabilization, transport, and storage of saliva samples to isolate DNA suitable for over-the-counter use with FDA cleared, approved, or exempt DNA carrier screening genotyping tests in adults of reproductive age
